record.field: model.custom_report_fix([ {'name': 'Facturas', 'new_name': 'Facturas', 'template_old': 'account.report_invoice_with_payments', 'template_new': 'dimabe_dte.custom_invoice', 'id': env.ref('account.account_invoices').id, 'paperformat_id': env.ref('dimabe_dte.paper_format_letter_custom').id, 'print_report_name': '(object._get_custom_report_name())' }, {'name': 'Facturas sin pago', 'new_name': 'Facturas sin pago', 'template_old': 'account.report_invoice', 'template_new': 'dimabe_dte.custom_invoice', 'id': env.ref('account.account_invoices_without_payment').id, 'paperformat_id': env.ref('dimabe_dte.paper_format_letter_custom').id, 'print_report_name': '(object._get_custom_report_name())' }, {'name': 'Guía de Despacho SII (DTE 52)', 'new_name': 'Guía de Despacho SII (DTE 52)', 'template_old': 'l10n_cl_edi_stock.delivery_guide_document', 'template_new': 'dimabe_dte.custom_dispatch_guide', 'id': env.ref('l10n_cl_edi_stock.action_delivery_guide_report_pdf').id, 'paperformat_id': env.ref('dimabe_dte.paper_format_letter_custom').id }, ])
